data.title: 10 Best Hotels near Fribourg Train Station, Fribourg 2024
data.meta_description: Find best hotels near Fribourg Train Station in Fribourg with promotions and discounts on Trip.com. Book rooms after reading real guest reviews and authentic pictures about hotels near Fribourg Train Station on Trip.com!
data.text:
How much do hotels in Fribourg cost?

Based on hotel prices on Trip.com, the average cost per night for hotels in Fribourg is USD 212. Hotel rates change often; this price is for reference only.

What are the most popular hotels in Fribourg?

Whether you're traveling for business or going on vacation, there are many popular hotels to choose from in Fribourg. Le Sauvage, Pérolles and Hotel Hine Adon Fribourg are all popular hotels to stay at.

At what hotels in Fribourg can I try local breakfast foods?

A delicious breakfast is a great way to kick start your day. At Mercure Fribourg Centre Remparts, Le Sauvage and Hotel Alpha , guests can enjoy Fribourg-style breakfasts.

Which hotels in Fribourg are suitable for families or travelers with kids?

Many people who travel with families or kids to Fribourg choose to stay at Le Sauvage, Hotel Alpha and Mercure Fribourg Centre Remparts . These hotels are also priced inexpensively.

What hotels in Fribourg are suitable for couples?

Whether you're going on a honeymoon or a vacation with your partner, Le Sauvage, Hôtel de la Rose and Mercure Fribourg Centre Remparts are some of the top hotels chosen by couples.

How much do hotels in Fribourg cost on the weekend?

Based on hotel prices on Trip.com, the average cost per night on the weekend for hotels in Fribourg is USD 202. Hotel rates change often; this price is for reference only.

When going on a business trip to Fribourg, which hotels are the most popular with business travelers?

When it comes to business trips, choosing a hotel with convenient transportation links is important to many guests. Hotel Alpha has convenient transportation links and an inexpensive price. Consider staying here during your trip.

At which popular hotels in Fribourg can I try local foods?

Those who like trying local foods might want to consider staying at Le Sauvage, Hotel Hine Adon Fribourg or Hôtel de la Rose . There are lots of famous restaurants serving local dishes near these hotels.

Of all the hotels in Fribourg, which hotels have the highest user ratings?

When traveling to Fribourg for the first time, many travelers find it difficult to choose a hotel to stay in. According to Trip.com data, Mercure Fribourg Centre Remparts, Le Sauvage and Hotel Alpha are popular hotels with high ratings, making them good choices for your trip.

What popular hotels in Fribourg have parking?

If you're planning on driving to Fribourg, why not stay at Hotel Alpha, Hotel Hine Adon Fribourg or Mercure Fribourg Centre Remparts ? These are all popular hotels with parking lots.

What popular hotels have non-smoking rooms in Fribourg?

Many guests care about the quality of the rooms they stay in and want to ensure that their rooms have fresh, clean air. Hotel Hine Adon Fribourg, Le Sauvage and Hotel Alpha are all popular hotels in Fribourg with non-smoking rooms.

In Fribourg, what popular hotels have free Wi-Fi?

When staying at a hotel, internet access is important for both vacationers and business travelers. Hôtel de la Rose, Mercure Fribourg Centre Remparts and Le Sauvage are all popular hotels in Fribourg with free Wi-Fi.

In Fribourg, which hotels have barrier-free access?

Mercure Fribourg Centre Remparts is a popular hotel in Fribourg with barrier-free access.
